meanings.sent1: The ancient tablet had hieroglyphical symbols carved into it.

meanings.sent4: Her expression was hieroglyphical, revealing nothing of her true feelings.
meanings.sent5: The hieroglyphical drawings on the tomb were beautifully intricate.
